Edges-Angel -- Male Human Heroic Angel
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d12 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes: Divine Might: +2 Strength Step/+2 Vigor Step
Skills (12 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Riding: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d8 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d6 Occult: (sma) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Skill Notes: Faith: +1 Faith Step
Size: 0
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 22
Features
Edges (13 points): Angel; Divine Blade; Divine Toughness; Holy Light; Immortality; Mystic Powers (Angel (Death)); Mystic Powers (Angel (Herald)); Searing Blast; Sense Supernatural; Speed Flight; Tongues; Toughness +2; Wing Strike Hindrances: Hesitant; Poverty; Vengeful+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Angel: Has Ageless, Beautify, Divine Might, Faith, Flight, Immune To Disease And Poison, Rage, and Servant Of Heaven features
Servant Of Heaven: Has Vow+ feature
Ageless: Does not age
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Sense Supernatural: R10" May sense presence of supernatural beings and effects
Tongues: Speaks every human language fluently
Vengeful+: Seeks revenge by any means
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 8 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 14 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Flak Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Chainsaw (2d6+4); Holy Water Spray (None R1"); SAW (2d8 R30" AP 2); Unarmed (d12+d0)
Combat Notes:
Divine Toughness: +2 Toughness
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Searing Blast: Increased Holy Light effects
Speed Flight: Increased Flight speed
Toughness+2: +2 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Divine Blade: Has a magical weapon that inflicts +d6 damage and negates the Immortality edge
Flight: Fly Pace 24
Hesitant: Uses the lowest of 2 Action Cards
Holy Light: R12" May create and move a 3" radius dim or bright light or attack with a 9" cone or 12" stream that inflicts 2d6 damage
Immortality: Reforms d4 dy after being slain
Immune To Disease And Poison: Has immunity to disease and poison
Rage: May spend a Benny to gain supernatural powers 1/session; suffers major psychosis afterward (Spirit-2 neg)
Wing Strike: Wings inflict d12+d8 damage; 5" charge inflicts an additional +4 damage/+2 Toughness when wings extended (Called Shot-2 neg)
Arcana
Power Points: 20
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Mystic Powers (Angel (Death)): 10 Power Points/May cast self Boost Trait, Deflection, self Protection, or Smite for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Angel (Herald)): 10 Power Points/May cast Boost/Lower Trait, Divination, Healing, or Scrying for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Beautify: May create minor beauty effects
